page.title: 03THE LADY IN WAITING
page.content:
CUSTOMS Mrs Gilmour was lady in waiting to the Duke and Duchess of Windsor in the 1920s, she liked her job a lot.When Mrs Gilmour went to Australia with the Duke and Duchess of Windsor she had to help them around and carry their flowers. Mrs Gilmour was on a ship with the Duke and Duchess when it caught fire, some people were drowned but they were saved. She thought it rather ordinary meeting them because they were good friends already. Also she met the prime minister as well as the Duke and Duchess. She had to wear new clothes but they did not have to be very important.
by Elizabeth & Patricia.
